name: MCTsolutions™
description: MCTsolutions™ is a leading & innovative nutritional fat powder (mufa/pufa/specialty) manufacturer involved in a wide range of nutritional fat powder ingredients to improve health, performance, and productivity. Through a consistently high standard of safety and quality, we deliver mctsolutions, complete series of coconut mct oil powders/ mct oil applications. It is a one-stop shop solution of premium mct oil powder in the market for different applications such as keto diet, sports nutrition, functional meal replacement, and other nutritional products, etc.
